  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/638</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/638</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La guerra de Troia</string>
            <string language="en">The Trojan War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Trojan Krieg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Guerre de Trojan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Guerra De Trojan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Guerra Di Trojan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο τρωικός πόλεμος</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que relaciona la pellícula "Troy" amb la realitat històrica, la mitologia i la literatura clàssica. Conté un plànol de la ciutat, fotogrames de la pellícula i enllaços per obtenir més informació literària i fílmica.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) comparing the film "Troy" with the real event, mythology and classical literature. It includes a plan of the city, stills from the film, and links for further information from literature and on the film.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història antiga</string>
            <string language="en">ancient history</string>
            <string language="es">historia antigua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">civilització clàssica</string>
            <string language="en">classical civilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llegenda</string>
            <string language="en">legend</string>
            <string language="es">leyenda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mitologia</string>
            <string language="en">mythology</string>
            <string language="es">mitología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und beantworten Sie (das 
DURCHSCHNITTLICHE) Vergleichen des Filmes "Troy" mit dem realen Fall, 
der Mythologie und der klassischen Literatur. Es schließt einen
Plan der Stadt, der Stille vom Film und der Links für weitere 
Informationen von der Literatur und über den Film ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remettez en cause et répondez à comparer (PAR) 
le film "Troy" au vrai événement, à la mythologie et à la 
littérature classique. Il inclut un plan de la ville, des 
distillateurs du film, et des liens pour de plus amples informations 
de la littérature et sur le film.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda a comparar (PAR) a película
"Troy" com o evento real, o mythology e a literatura classical. 
Inclui uma planta da cidade, de destiladores da película, e de 
ligações para uma informação mais adicional da literatura e na 
película.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a paragonare (PAR) la 
pellicola "Troy" all'evento reale, alla mitologia ed alla letteratura 
classica. Include un programma della città, degli alambicchi 
dalla pellicola e dei collegamenti per ulteriori informazioni da 
letteratura e sulla pellicola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που συγκρίνουν την ταινία 
"τρόυ" με το πραγματικό γεγονός, τη μυθολογία και την κλασσική 
λογοτεχνία. Περιλαμβάνει ένα σχέδιο της πόλης, των 
αποστακτήρων από την ταινία, και των συνδέσεων για περισσότερες 
πληροφορίες από τη λογοτεχνία και στην ταινία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alte Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">klassische Zivilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Legende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire antique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">civilisation classique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">légende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history antigo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">civilização classical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">legenda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mythology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia antica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">civilizzazione classica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">leggenda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mitologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαία ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλασσικός πολιτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μύθος</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μυθολογία</string>
          </keyword>
